ygData.subject: Re: Question about the Vampiric Embrace Spell
ygData.msgSnippet: a. it doesnt work every time. it is random b. the spell was recently changed. origionally it was a touch-only spell, but now it can be used with any weapon.
ygData.messageBody:
a. it doesnt work every time. it is random
b. the spell was recently changed. origionally it was a touch-only spell,
but now it can be used with any weapon.

belphenor
lodge of the dead
neriak, fennin ro


>From: "Sebastien Pinsonnault" <seeker66@...>
>
>Hello all,
>
>I am a proud level 10 Gnome Necro in Freeport and I have a question about
>one spell. Does anyone know how to correctly use the Vampiric Embrace
>spell?
>I mean I thought it was like lifetap or lifespike (where you target your
>opponent and you steal his HP) but with this spell when I target a monster,
>I see I hand icon appear on my display and nothing else happens. Now I have
>tried to attack a creature and sometimes when the thing dies I get some
>HP's
>back but not all the time....
>
>Do I have to be bare handed for it to work or is there something I am doing
>wrong?
>
>Any help with this spell would be appreciated.
>
>
>thanks in advance.
>
>
>Cilten
>Level 10 Gnome Necromancer
>Cazic-Thule Server
>
